title.narrative: COMMUNICATIONS

description.narrative: By 2018, the right of children to expression is progressively fulfilled and donors, authorities and other stakeholders and duty bearers are increasingly aware of the situation of children and women in Burundi, especially the most vulnerable, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Environmental Sustainability, Human Rights Institutions, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2010-2018 - Outcome 6 / Cross-sectoral programme: National monitoring and evaluation structures provide reliable data for monitoring SDGs and other national goals and advocacy for children and women by the end of 2016

participating-org.narrative: FAWE FORUM FOR AFRICAN WOMEN EDUCATIONALISTS
PROGRAMME NATIONAL DE SANTE DE LA REPRODUCTION

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, the right of children to expression is progressively fulfilled and donors, authorities and other stakeholders and dutybearers are increasingly aware of the situation of children and women in Burundi, especially the most vulnerable

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to draw attention to the situation of Children in Burundi through publications in traditional and digital media. Child Journalists produced 162 radio programmes while 36 members of the National Children's Forum advocated for child participation. UNICEF champions and celebrities were involved in public events, national and global campaigns. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018

target.value: 2018:35,000 Facebook likes and 1,200 followers on Instagram

actual.value: 2018:33,898 Facebook likes and 1,277 followers on Instagram
